mapper.sql: "refTime", "surfaceValue", lon, lat, value, st_asgeojson(shape) as shape
mapper.insert: insert into "Geopotential_height" ("refTime", "surfaceValue", lon, lat, value, shape) values (#{reftime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{surfacevalue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{value,jdbcType=DOUBLE},st_setsrid(st_geomfromgeojson(#{item.geojson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),4326))

insert into "Geopotential_height"
"refTime",
"surfaceValue",
lon,
lat,
value,
shape,
#{reftime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{surfacevalue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{value,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
st_setsrid(st_geomfromgeojson(#{item.geojson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),4326)
mapper.update:
update "Geopotential_height"
lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
value = #{value,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
shape = st_setsrid(st_geomfromgeojson(#{item.geojson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),4326)
where "refTime" = #{reftime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and "surfaceValue" = #{surfacevalue,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update "Geopotential_height" set lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, value = #{value,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, shape = st_setsrid(st_geomfromgeojson(#{item.geojson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),4326) where "refTime" = #{reftime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and "surfaceValue" = #{surfacevalue,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into "Geopotential_height" ("refTime", "surfaceValue", lon,lat, value, shape) values
(#{item.reftime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.surfacevalue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.value,jdbcType=DOUBLE},st_setsrid(st_geomfromgeojson(#{item.geojson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),4326))
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM pg_tables WHERE tablename = '${tableName}' AND "schemaname" = 'public'
SELECT tablename FROM pg_tables WHERE tablename like '${tableName}%' AND "schemaname" = 'public'
